alert.note: Alert for St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 11:37AM CDT until May 19 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Southwestern Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... St. Louis City in east central Missouri... Southeastern St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1137 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lemay, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dupo and East Carondelet around 1145 AM CDT. Millstadt and Cahokia Parks Airport around 1150 AM CDT. Cahokia, Alorton and Brooklyn around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Centreville, Venice, Belleville, East St. Louis, Washington Park, Fairmont City, Fairview Heights, Swansea, Shiloh, O`Fallon, Collinsville and Caseyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 12. Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 272 and 277. This also includes Scott Joplin Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
